Interface IUserManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
Applicant, HDBManager, HDBOfficer, User
public interface IUserManagement
Interface for managing user operations in the BTO Management System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    authenticate(String nric, String password)
    Authenticates a user with their credentials.
    boolean
    changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
    Changes the user's password.
    boolean
    validateNRIC(String nric)
    Validates the NRIC format.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      boolean authenticate(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with their credentials.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC (National Registration Identity Card)
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the user's password.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - The current password
      newPassword - The new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise

    • validateNRIC

      boolean validateNRIC(String nric)
      Validates the NRIC format.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC is valid, false otherwise
